subject: Experimental programming
msgSnippet: Subscribers to this mailing list might be interest in an ongoing discussion on The Cafes about Experimental Programming:
messageBody:
Subscribers to this mailing list might be interest in an ongoing
discussion on The Cafes about Experimental Programming:

http://cafe.elharo.com/java/experimental-programming/

In brief, I relate the story of a bug fix in XOM, and argue for the
primacy of testing and experiment over claimed understanding of code.

--
